column1: Keep your eyes open for our special Back to School items and save A LOT!
column2: 请随时关注我们的新学期开学大促销，惊喜不断！

column1: If you have an account with us, please log in.
column2: 如果你已经注册成为会员,请登录

column1: Please enter your email address below. You will receive a link to reset your password.
column2: 请输入邮件地址,你将会收到一个链接来从新设置你的密码.

column1: You are currently not subscribed to any newsletter.
column2: 您目前没有订阅任何邮件.

column1: From your My Account Dashboard you have the ability to view a snapshot of your recent account activity and update your account information. Select a link below to view or edit information.
column2: 在这里你可以看到最近的状态和更新账户信息.请点击以下的链接去查看和编辑.

column1: By creating an account with our store, you will be able to move through the checkout process faster, store multiple shipping addresses, view and track your orders in your account and more.
column2: 注册账号可以让你拥有加快结账速度,存储多个送货地址,查看和追踪你的订单等等功能.
